notes: Must, have to. Impersonal verb - same form for all persons. This is a modal verb.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Трябва' е модален глагол. Must, have to.
cultural_note: Used impersonally: 'Трябва да отида' (I must go). Essential modal.

notes: To want. Perfective: искам (same). Conjugation: искам/искаш/иска/искаме/искате/искат. This is a imperfective.
cultural_note: Most common way to express wants: 'Искам вода' (I want water).

notes: Can, be able to. Conjugation: мога/можеш/може/можем/можете/могат. This is a imperfective.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Мога' е несвършен вид. Can, be able to.
cultural_note: Express ability: 'Мога да плувам' (I can swim). Essential modal.

notes: To have. Conjugation: имам/имаш/има/имаме/имате/имат. This is a imperfective.
cultural_note: Possession and obligation: 'Имам книга' (I have a book), 'Имам да работя' (I have to work).

notes: To not have. Negative form of имам. Same conjugation pattern. This is a imperfective.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Нямам' е несвършен вид. To not have.
cultural_note: Merged negative: 'Нямам време' (I don't have time). Written as one word.

notes: To be (perfective). Future auxiliary. Forms: бъда/бъдеш/бъде/бъдем/бъдете/бъдат. This is a perfective.
cultural_note: Used in future tense: 'Ще бъда тук' (I will be here). Perfective counterpart of 'съм'.

notes: To say/tell (perfective). Imperfective: казвам. Conjugation: кажа/кажеш/каже. This is a perfective.
cultural_note: Perfective for completed speech act: 'Ще ти кажа' (I'll tell you).

notes: To do/make (perfective). Imperfective: правя. Conjugation: направя/направиш/направи. This is a perfective.
cultural_note: Completed action: 'Направих го' (I did/made it). Very common perfective.

notes: To become, get up (perfective). Imperfective: ставам. Conjugation: стана/станеш/стане. This is a perfective.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Стана' е свършен вид. To become, get up (perfective).
cultural_note: State change: 'Стана студено' (It got cold). Past: станах.

notes: To come (perfective). Imperfective: идвам. Conjugation: дойда/дойдеш/дойде. This is a perfective.
cultural_note: Completed arrival: 'Ще дойда утре' (I'll come tomorrow). Essential perfective.

notes: To go (perfective). Imperfective: отивам. Conjugation: отида/отидеш/отиде. This is a perfective.
cultural_note: Completed departure: 'Отидох вкъщи' (I went home). Past: отидох.

notes: To sit down (perfective). Imperfective: сядам. Conjugation: седна/седнеш/седне. This is a perfective.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Седна' е свършен вид. To sit down (perfective).
cultural_note: Completed action of sitting: 'Седни тук' (Sit down here - imperative).

notes: To see (perfective). Already covered but essential. Imperfective: виждам. This is a perfective.
cultural_note: Completed seeing: 'Видях го' (I saw him). Very common perfective.

notes: To find (perfective). Imperfective: намирам. Conjugation: намеря/намериш/намери. This is a perfective.
cultural_note: Completed finding: 'Намерих ключа' (I found the key).

notes: To understand (perfective). Imperfective: разбирам. Conjugation: разбера/разбереш/разбере. This is a perfective.
cultural_note: Moment of understanding: 'Разбрах!' (I understood!/I got it!).
Common emotion/state adjective. Happy, fortunate. Forms: щастлив/щастлива/щастливо/щастливи

examples.bg: Аз съм happy, fortunate. forms: щастлив.

linguistic_note: Adjective forms: Happy, fortunate. Forms: щастлив/щастлива/щастливо/щастливи

cultural_note: Common emotion/state adjective. Sad. Forms: тъжен/тъжна/тъжно/тъжни

cultural_note: Common emotion/state adjective. Angry. Forms: сърдит/сърдита/сърдито/сърдити
Common emotion/state adjective. Tired. Forms: уморен/уморена/уморено/уморени
Common emotion/state adjective. Hungry. Forms: гладен/гладна/гладно/гладни
Common emotion/state adjective. Thirsty. Forms: жаден/жадна/жадно/жадни
Common emotion/state adjective. Sick, ill. Forms: болен/болна/болно/болни

examples.bg: Аз съм sick, ill. forms: болен.

linguistic_note: Adjective forms: Sick, ill. Forms: болен/болна/болно/болни

notes: Healthy. Forms: здрав/здрава/здраво/здрави. Also used as greeting!
notes_bg_to_de: 'Здрав' описва емоция/състояние. Форми: здрав/здрава/здраво/здрави. Also used as greeting!
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Здрав' = 'gesund'. Dekliniert: здрав/здрава/здраво/здрави. Also used as greeting!
cultural_note: Common emotion/state adjective. Healthy. Forms: здрав/здрава/здраво/здрави. Also used as greeting!

examples.bg: Те са здрави. Also used as greeting!.

linguistic_note: Adjective forms: Healthy. Forms: здрав/здрава/здраво/здрави. Also used as greeting!
linguistic_note_bg_to_de: Healthy. Forms: здрав/здрава/здраво/здрави. Also used as greeting!
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Forms: Healthy. Forms: здрав/здрава/здраво/здрави. Also used as greeting!

cultural_note: Common emotion/state adjective. Ready, prepared. Forms: готов/готова/готово/готови

examples.bg: Аз съм ready, prepared. forms: готов.

linguistic_note: Adjective forms: Ready, prepared. Forms: готов/готова/готово/готови
